id: get-games
title: "Get Games"
description: "Get all games. Successful request will return an array of [Game Objects](/restapi/docs/schemas/game-object). We recommended reading the [filtering documentation](/restapi/docs/restapi-getting-started#filtering) to return only the records you want."
sidebar_label: "Get Games"

---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Games"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/games"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get all games. Successful request will return an array of [Game Objects](/restapi/docs/schemas/game-object). We recommended reading the [filtering documentation](/restapi/docs/restapi-getting-started#filtering) to return only the records you want.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"query","description":"Unique id of the game.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"status","in":"query","description":"Status of the game (only admins can filter by this field, see [status and visibility](/restapi/docs/status-amp-visibility) for details).","schema":{"title":"Permission Enum","type":"integer","enum":[0,1,3],"x-enumDescriptions":{"NOT_ACCEPTED (0)":"Not accepted.","ACCEPTED (1)":"Accepted and live.","DELETED (3)":"Deleted."}}},{"name":"submitted_by","in":"query","description":"Unique id of the user who has ownership of the game.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"date_added","in":"query","description":"Unix timestamp of date game was registered.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"date_updated","in":"query","description":"Unix timestamp of date game was updated.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"date_live","in":"query","description":"Unix timestamp of date game was set live.","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"name","in":"query","description":"Name of the game.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"name_id","in":"query","description":"Path for the game on mod.io. For example: https://mod.io/g/gamename","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"summary","in":"query","description":"Summary of the games mod support.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"instructions_url","in":"query","description":"Link to a mod.io guide, modding wiki or a page where modders can learn how to make and submit mods.","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"ugc_name","in":"query","description":"Word used to describe user-generated content (mods, items, addons etc).","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"presentation_option","in":"query","description":"Presentation style used on the mod.io website","schema":{"title":"Game Presentation Enum","description":"Presentation style used on the mod.io website.","type":"integer","enum":[0,1],"example":0,"x-enumDescriptions":{"GRID (0)":"Grid View: Displays mods in a grid","TABLE (1)":"Table View: Displays mods in a table"}}},{"name":"submission_option","in":"query","description":"Submission process modders must follow","schema":{"title":"Submission Options Enum","description":"Submission process modders must follow.","type":"integer","enum":[0,1],"example":0,"x-enumDescriptions":{"CONTROLLED (0)":"Mod uploads must occur via the API using a tool created by the game developers","ALL (1)":"Mod uploads can occur from anywhere, including the website and API"}}},{"name":"curation_option","in":"query","description":"Curation option enabled by this game to approve mods","schema":{"title":"Curation Enum","description":"Curation option enabled by this game to approve mods.","type":"integer","enum":[0,1,2],"example":0,"x-enumDescriptions":{"DISABLED (0)":"Disabled","MARKETPLACE_QUEUE (1)":"Marketplace queue","LIVE_REQUIRES_APPROVAL (2)":"Live requires approval"}}},{"name":"dependency_option","in":"query","description":"Dependency option for this game's mods.","schema":{"title":"Dependency Enum","description":"Dependency option for this game's mods.","type":"integer","enum":[0,1,2,3],"example":0,"x-enumDescriptions":{"DISALLOW_DEPENDENCIES (0)":"Disallow dependencies","ALLOW_DEPENDENCIES_OPT_IN (1)":"Allow dependencies, mods must opt in","ALLOW_DEPENDENCIES_OPT_OUT (2)":"Allow dependencies, mods must opt out","ALLOW_DEPENDENCIES (3)":"Allow dependencies with no restrictions"}}},{"name":"community_options","in":"query","description":"Community features enabled for this game. Combine to find games with multiple options enabled (see [BITWISE fields](/restapi/docs/bitwise-and-bitwise-and))","schema":{"title":"Game Community Option Enum","description":"Community features enabled for this game. Add the options you want together, to enable multiple features (see [BITWISE fields](/restapi/docs/bitwise-and-bitwise-and))","type":"integer","enum":[0,1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128,256,512,1024,2048],"example":0,"x-enumDescriptions":{"DISABLED (0)":"None","ALLOW_MOD_COMMENTS (1)":"Allow comments on mods","GUIDES (2)":"Allow guides","PIN_HOMEPAGE (4)":"Pin on homepage","SHOW_ON_HOMEPAGE (8)":"Show on homepage","SHOW_MORE_ON_HOMEPAGE (16)":"Show more on homepage","CAN_CHANGE_STATUS (32)":"Allow change status","ALLOW_PREVIEWS (64)":"Enable Previews (Game must be hidden)","ALLOW_PREVIEW_URL (128)":"Allow preview share-URL (Previews must be enabled)","ALLOW_NEGATIVE_RATINGS (256)":"Allow negative ratings","ALLOW_MODS_TO_BE_EDITED_VIA_WEB (512)":"Allow mods to be edited via web","ALLOW_DEPENDENCY (1024)":"Allow mod dependencies","ALLOW_GUIDE_COMMENTS (2048)":"Allow comments on guides"}}},{"name":"monetization_options","in":"query","description":"Monetization options enabled for this game. Combine to find games with multiple options enabled (see [BITWISE fields](/restapi/docs/bitwise-and-bitwise-and))","schema":{"title":"Monetization Permission Enum","description":"Monetization options enabled for this game. Add the options you want together, to enable multiple features (see [BITWISE fields](/restapi/docs/bitwise-and-bitwise-and))","type":"integer","enum":[0,1,2,4,8,16],"x-enumDescriptions":{"DISABLED (0)":"Access to monetization features disabled","MONETIZATION (1)":"Access to monetization features enabled by mod.io","MARKETPLACE (2)":"Marketplace enabled","PARTNER_PROGRAM (4)":"Creator partner program enabled","LIMITED (8)":"Quantity limited mods supported","FORCED_LIMITED (16)":"All mods must be quantity limited"}}},{"name":"api_access_options","in":"query","description":"Level of API access allowed by this game. Combine to find games with multiple options enabled (see [BITWISE fields](/restapi/docs/bitwise-and-bitwise-and))","schema":{"title":"Api Access Enum","description":"Level of API access allowed by this game. Add the options you want together, to enable multiple features (see [BITWISE fields](/restapi/docs/bitwise-and-bitwise-and))","type":"integer","enum":[0,1,2,4,8],"x-enumDescriptions":{"NONE (0)":"none","OPEN (1)":"Allow 3rd parties to access this games API endpoints","DOWNLOADS (2)":"Allow mods to be downloaded directly (if disabled all download URLs will contain a frequently changing verification hash to stop unauthorized use)","AUTHORISED_DOWNLOADS (4)":"Requires a bearer token to be supplied when attempting the download to enforce authenticated downloads only","PAID_DOWNLOADS (8)":"Requires a bearer token to be supplied and for the user to own the file when attempting the download"}}},{"name":"maturity_options","in":"query","description":"Mature content setup for this game.","schema":{"title":"Game Maturity Enum","description":"Mature content setup for this game.","type":"integer","enum":[0,1,2],"x-enumDescriptions":{"MODS_DENY (0)":"Don't allow mature content in mods","MODS_ALLOW (1)":"Allow mature content in mods","ADULTS_ONLY (2)":"This game is for mature audiences only"}}},{"name":"show_hidden_tags","in":"query","description":"Show the hidden tags associated with the given game.","schema":{"type":"boolean"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

Group names and tags will be localized into the specified `Accept-Language` header value if provided, for a list of supported languages see [Localization](/restapi/docs/localization) (Note that if a localized variant of a tag is not available it will default to English).","type":"array","items":{"title":"Game Tag Option Localized Object","properties":{"name":{"description":"Name of the tag group.","type":"string","example":"Theme"},"name_localized":{"type":"string"},"type":{"description":"Can multiple tags be selected via 'checkboxes' or should only a single tag be selected via a 'dropdown'.","type":"string","example":"checkboxes"},"tags":{"description":"Array of tags in this group.","type":"array","items":{"description":"Tag value","type":"string","example":"Horror"}},"tags_localized":{"description":"List of tag names and the localized variant of the tag.","type":"object","example":{"Horror":"Horreur"},"additionalProperties":{"type":"string"}},"tag_count_map":{"description":"List of tag names and the count of mods with these tags.","type":"object","example":{"Horror":52},"additionalProperties":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"hidden":{"description":"Groups of tags flagged as 'hidden' are intended to be used for filtering (eg. game version), but should not be displayed to users. Hidden tags will only be returned if `show_hidden_tags` is set to `true`.","type":"boolean","example":false},"locked":{"description":"Groups of tags flagged as 'locked' are editable only if the authenticated user is a team member of the parent game. game.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":16394},"date_expires":{"description":"Unix timestamp until this game's statistics are considered variables.","properties":{"primary":{"description":"The primary hex color code.","type":"string","example":"#44bfd5"},"dark":{"description":"The dark hex color code.","type":"string","example":"#2c2c3f"},"light":{"description":"The light hex color code.","type":"string","example":"#ffffff"},"success":{"description":"The success hex color code.","type":"string","example":"#ff000e"}},"type":"object"},"platforms":{"description":"Platforms that are supported by this title.","type":"array","items":{"title":"Game Platforms Object","description":"Contains platform filtering data for this game. This object is only applicable if the game has [cross-platform moderation](/restapi/docs/targeting-a-platform) enabled. Otherwise this value will always be `null`.","properties":{"platform":{"title":"Platform String Enum","description":"A [target platform](/restapi/docs/targeting-a-platform).","type":"string","enum":["ALL","WINDOWS","MAC","LINUX","ANDROID","IOS","XBOXONE","XBOXSERIESX","PLAYSTATION4","PLAYSTATION5","SWITCH","OCULUS","SOURCE"],"example":"PLAYSTATION5","x-enumDescriptions":{"ALL":"All Platforms","WINDOWS":"Windows","MAC":"Mac","LINUX":"Linux","ANDROID":"Android","IOS":"Iphone IOS","XBOXONE":"Xbox One","XBOXSERIESX":"Xbox Series X","PLAYSTATION4":"Playstation 4","PLAYSTATION5":"Playstation 5","SWITCH":"Switch","OCULUS":"Oculus","SOURCE":"Source"}},"label":{"description":"A presentable label of the platform.","type":"string","example":"PlayStation 5"},"moderated":{"description":"Is this platform moderated by game admins? If false, then user submissions for the platform will be available immediately providing the game has mod curation disabled.","type":"boolean","example":true},"locked":{"description":"Are users able to upload files to this platform? By default, users are able to upload to all supported platforms, platforms set to `true` may only be used by game admins only.","type":"boolean","example":true}},"type":"object"}}},"type":"object"}},"result_count":{"description":"Number of results returned in this request.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":70},"result_offset":{"description":"Number of results skipped over. Defaults to 0 unless overridden by `_offset` filter.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":0},"result_limit":{"description":"Maximum number of results returned in the request. Defaults to 100 (max) unless overridden by `_limit` filter.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":100},"result_total":{"description":"Total number of results found.","type":"integer","format":"int32","example":70}},"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
